name: Fey Drake
description: A small dragon characterized by its graceful flight and mischievous demeanor, the Fey Drake has bright scales that shimmer in various colors, embodying the whimsical nature of fey creatures.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate foes with spells and become invisible makes it a formidable and unpredictable opponent.
goals: To play tricks, manipulate others, and exert whimsical chaos.
relations: Often associated with other fey creatures and may be found working with or against them.
environment: Typically found in enchanted forests or magical glades.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma make it an excellent ambusher and spellcaster.
weaknesses: Low Strength limits its physical attacks.
attacks: Three quick bite attacks, each dealing piercing damage and potentially poisoning the target.
most_powerful_ability: Bewildering Breath that charms enemies in a wide area, limiting their combat effectiveness.
senses: Can see in darkness and has a passive perception of 16, making it quite aware of its surroundings.
skills: Notable for its proficiency in stealth, arcana, deception, and perception, with exceptional sneakiness due to high Dexterity.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Superior Invisibility allows it to become invisible at will.
Innate spellcasting capability to cast various spells without components.
Can charm or control opponents through spells like dominate person and hypnotic pattern.
Weak physicality but powerful magical potential.
spellcasting: Can cast spells at will like charm person, color spray, and grease; and three times a day can use hypnotic pattern and suggestion.
test_queries: mischievous flying dragon with magical breath
